String.string: Order to Subjugate the Roaring Forest
Thank you for your hard work
Token of Subjugating the Roaring Forest

Kill {@Creature:47#4001$$argonomorph Dagonite crusaders}, {@Creature:47#4002$$argonomorph naga wyrmlings}, and {@Creature:47#4003$$argonomorph gula smashers} on the {@Rgn:47005$$Argon Frontier} and collect tokens.
Get reward from the village reward coordinator.
